DBIx::Class::CDBICompat::SQLTransformer(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation DBIx::Class::CDBICompat::SQLTransformer(3)

NAME

DBIx::Class::CDBICompat::SQLTransformer - Transform SQL

DESCRIPTION

This is a copy of Class::DBI::SQL::Transformer from Class::DBI 3.0.17. It is here so we can be compatible with Class::DBI without having it installed.

2013-04-03 perl v5.18.4
